desc: path to configuration file (XDG_CONFIG_HOME/foot/foot.ini)

initial window title

window WIDTHxHEIGHT, in characters (not set)

log-level (warning)
enable or disable colorization of log output on stderr
disable syslog logging (server mode only)
display an existing pty instead of creating one
